titleStmt.title: Arthur Lord Capell Lieutenant Generall under the Prince His Highnesse of His Majesties forces, in the counties of VVorcester, Salop, and Chester, and the sixt northern counties of VVales To all commanders, officers, and souldiers, and to all other His Majesties subjects whatsoever, whom these presents shall or may in anywise concern.
titleStmt.author: Capel of Hadham, Arthur Capel, Baron, 1610?-1649.

titleStmt.title: Arthur Lord Capell Lieutenant Generall under the Prince His Highnesse of His Majesties forces, in the counties of VVorcester, Salop, and Chester, and the sixt northern counties of VVales To all commanders, officers, and souldiers, and to all other His Majesties subjects whatsoever, whom these presents shall or may in anywise concern.
titleStmt.author: Capel of Hadham, Arthur Capel, Baron, 1610?-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie. And by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: A proclamation by Lord Capel with reference to complaints made "of some outrages and plunders committed by some souldiers of His Majesties service", and forbidding all confiscation of property except by warrant of the King.
Dated at end: Given under my hand and seale at arms this third day of Aprill. 1643.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majestie. And
Capel of Hadham, Arthur Capel, Baron,
